question:
Which of the following is / are correct statements with respect to Graphite?
  1. It is the most stable phase of carbon at normal conditions
  2. It is made of made of sp3 hybridized carbon atoms
  3. It is good conductor of both heat and electricity
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Graphite is an allotrope of Carbon. It is a good conductor of electricity as well as heat. It is also most stable phase of carbon at normal conditions. It is made of made out of sp<sup>2</sup> hybridized carbon atoms.
